original_text: And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,
korean_text: 곧 그 때로 일어나 예루살렘에 돌아가 보니 열한 제자 및 그들과 함께 한 자들이 모여 있어

sentences.original_text: And they rose up the same hour
and found the eleven gathered together
sentences.korean_translation: 열한 사람이 모여 있는 것을 발견하고

sentences.original_text: and them that were with them
